subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The United States Open seemed to be following the script of Jim Furyk’s 2003 win, but after an errant shot at the 13th hole, things began to go awry.
snippet: The United States Open seemed to be following the script of Jim Furyk’s 2003 win, but after an errant shot at the 13th hole, things began to go awry.
